title: Hash Type Identification
description:
Match each hash to its algorithm:

Hash A: 5d41402abc4b2a76b9719d911017c592 (32 hex chars)
Hash B: aaf4c61ddcc5e8a2dabede0f3b482cd9aea9434d (40 hex chars)
Hash C: 2cf24dba5fb0a30e26e83b2ac5b9e29e1b161e5c1fa7425e73043362938b9824 (64 hex chars)

What algorithm produced Hash C?

Submit as: flag{algorithm} (lowercase, with hyphen if applicable)
hints: Hash length is a key indicator: MD5=32, SHA-1=40, SHA-256=64 hex chars
Hash C is 64 hex characters = 256 bits
This is the SHA-2 family member with 256-bit output
